posts.name: Lara Fernando
posts.cooked:
Hi everyone!

FRC 971, Spartan Robotics, is excited to release the full itinerary and schedule for our sixth annual Spartan Series, an event where some of our incredible mentors and students give workshops on all things robotics!All information can be found here: https://www.frc971.org/spartan-series

We invite everyone of all skill and experience levels to attend the event and learn more about mechanical, software, electrical, leadership, and more. Spartan Series is an amazing opportunity to gain knowledge, build skills, meet new people, and network.

The url to RSVP can be found here: http://url.mvhs.io/SpartanSeries23 Hope to see you there!

posts.name: Zachary
posts.cooked: Looking forward to it! Is this on Sunday the 17th, or Saturday the 16th? The site says “Saturday the 17th”. (Also, the website refresh is )

posts.name: Lara Fernando
posts.cooked:
Spartan Series is on Sunday the 17th

Thank you, the new website was one of our projects this past season we had a team of awesome students who made it happen!

posts.name: Omer Prag
posts.cooked: In order to watch the lectures online or listen to recordings, do I need to fill out this form as well?

posts.name: jedgar6
posts.cooked: I am assuming so. Their past series were uploaded to their youtube channel @ https://www.youtube.com/@smanrobotics/videos

posts.name: Jason Spitzak
posts.cooked: Is there a way to watch a broadcasted version of the talks live? Thanks!

posts.name: Beta
posts.cooked: in the other thread they said they were going to record them but idk if they will broadcasted live

posts.name: Andrew Lawrence
posts.cooked: Unfortunately I’ll be unexpectedly out of town this weekend, but I’m really looking forward to the adhesives and carbon fiber workshop!
